# Other topics

This section contains information on more advanced use of NMA.

## Command line use

Nuclear Morphology Analysis is designed to be runnable via the command line for a new analysis or to export nuclear measurements from an existing `nmd` file.

The examples below use the cross platform standalone jar with a system installation of Java. 

To see all options:
```
java -jar Nuclear_Morphology_Analysis_${project.version}_standalone.jar -h
```

To run a new analysis:

```
java -jar Nuclear_Morphology_Analysis_${project.version}_standalone.jar -d /path/to/image/directory -o /path/to/options/file
```

To export data from an `.nmd` file:

```
java -jar Nuclear_Morphology_Analysis_${project.version}_standalone.jar -n /path/to/nmd/file
```
